vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.8; also translated "valor";
§ Sallu or Salu or Sallai = "weighed"
a Benjamite
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒路 或 撒來 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "有重量的"
1) 所羅巴伯時期的一位祭司 (尼 12:7, 20)
2) 西緬支派首領心利的父親 (民 25:14)
3) 一名被擄後的便雅憫人 (代上 9:7; 尼 11:7)
4) 一名被擄歸回的便雅憫人 (尼11:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒路 或 撒来 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "有重量的"
1) 所罗巴伯时期的一位祭司 (尼 12:7, 20)
2) 西缅支派首领心利的父亲 (民 25:14)
3) 一名被掳后的便雅悯人 (代上 9:7; 尼 11:7)
4) 一名被掳归回的便雅悯人 (尼11:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.7; also called Sallai at Neh.12.20;
Also named: sal.lay (סַלַּי "Sallai" H5543E)
§ Sallu or Salu or Sallai = "weighed"
a priest in the time of Zerubbabel

A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.25.14;
father of: Zimri (H2174)
§ Sallu or Salu or Sallai = "weighed"
father of Zimri, the prince of the Simeonites, who was slain by Phinehas
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Mesulam; tribu de Benjamín; post exílico; (b)   hijo de Mesulam; tribu de Benjamín; post exílico
